output_list.criticism: The mint function does not have any checks to prevent integer overflow. An attacker can set an arbitrary value for an arbitrary user's balance, which can lead to loss of funds or other unintended consequences.

The mintBatch function does not have any checks to prevent integer overflow. An attacker can set an arbitrary value for an arbitrary user's balance, which can lead to loss of funds or other unintended consequences.
